item.description:
Join members and guests of the SSDOMG as we discover another restaurant on the south shore!  We'll be dining at The Red Parrot along Nantasket Beach.  Many memnbers have expressed an interest in dining here.  Join us midweek for dinner by the ocean and a possible view of the sunset.  Either way, the salty air, good food and even better company will be worth it. Twin lobster special this night $19.95 and live music starting at 7PM on the outdoor patio overlooking the water by Brendan Ryan. Check out their website listed below to view a full menu.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Let's Dine By the Ocean!

Wednesday, August 15th @ 7pm

The Red Parrot

One Hull Shore Dr.

Nantasket Beach

Hull, MA 02045

781-925-1115

Website: http://www.theredparrot.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet inside the front door. We may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.

Organizers: Alison & Jeanne

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each, Guests - $2 each; $6 to become an Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 4 people by 8 PM Tuesday 8/14. No maximum at this time.

Guests: One per member. One free guest for Annual Members!

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, August 14th 8PM. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event and are subject to our Group's No-Show Policy.

No-Show Policy on Membership Information Page: (Please click on the following link to be taken directly to the page.)

http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/pages/Membership_Information/

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: We will meet rain or shine. May sit on the outside patio if weather permits. Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

 

Please see the Pages tab for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions:
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Dine By The Ocean!
